ROM 9.11 aþþan nauhþanuh ni gabauranai wesun, aiþþau tawidedeina ƕa þiuþis aiþþau unþiuþis,
ei bi gawaleinai muns gudis wisai, ROM 9.12 ni us waurstwam, ak us þamma laþondin qiþan ist izai þatei sa maiza skalkinoþ þamma minnizin,
ROM 9.13 swaswe gameliþ ist:
Iakob frijoda, iþ Esaw fijaida.
ROM 9.14 ƕa nu qiþam?
ibai inwindiþa fram guda?
nissijai!
ROM 9.15 du Mose auk qiþiþ:
gaarma þanei arma, jah gableiþja þanei bleiþja.
ROM 9.16 þannu nu ni wiljandins ni rinnandins, ak armandins gudis.
ROM 9.17 qiþiþ auk þata gamelido du Faraoni, unte
in þize jah raisida þuk, ei gabairhtjau bi þus maht meina jah gateihaidau namo mein and alla airþa.
ROM 9.18 þannu nu jai þanei wili armaiþ, iþ þanei wili gahardeiþ.
ROM 9.19 qiþis mis nu:
aþþan ƕa nauh faianda?
unte wiljin is ƕas andstandiþ?
ROM 9.20 þannu nu jai, manna, þu ƕas is, ei andwaurdjais guda?
ibai qiþiþ gadikis du þamma digandin:
ƕa mik gatawides swa?
ROM 9.21 þau niu habaiþ kasja waldufni þahons us þamma samin daiga taujan sum du galaubamma kasa, sum-uþ-þan du ungalaubamma?

ROM 9.22 iþ jabai wiljands guþ ustaiknjan þwairhein jah uskannjan þata mahteigo usbeidands was in managai laggamodein bi kasam þwairheins gamanwidaim du fralustai, ROM 9.23 ei gakannidedi gabein wulþaus seinis bi kasam armaions þoei fauragamanwida du wulþau; ROM 9.24 þanzei jah laþoda uns ni þatainei us Iudaium, ak jah us þiudom,
ROM 9.25 swaswe jah in Osaiin qiþiþ:
haita þo ni managein meina managein meina, jah þo unliubon liubon;
ROM 9.26 jah wairþiþ in þamma stada þarei qiþada im:
ni managei meina jus,
þai haitanda sunjus gudis libandins.
ROM 9.27 iþ Esaïas hropeiþ bi Israel:
jabai wesi raþjo suniwe Israelis swaswe malma mareins, laibos ganisand.
ROM 9.28 waurd auk ustiuhands jah gamaurgjands in garaihtein, unte waurd gamaurgiþ taujiþ frauja ana airþai.
ROM 9.29 jah swaswe fauraqaþ Esaïas:
nih frauja Sabaoþ biliþi unsis fraiwa, swe Saudauma þau waurþeima jah swe Gaumaurra þau galeikai waurþeima.
ROM 9.30 ƕa nu qiþam?
þatei þiudos þos ni laistjandeins garaihtein gafaifahun garaihtein, aþþan garaihtein þo us galaubeinai;
ROM 9.31 iþ Israel laistjands witoþ garaihteins bi witoþ garaihteins ni gasnau.
ROM 9.32 Duƕe?
unte ni us galaubeinai, ak us waurstwam witodis;
bistuggqun du staina bistuggqis,
ROM 9.33 swaswe gameliþ ist:
sai, galagja in Sion stain bistuggqis jah hallu gamarzeinais, jah sa galaubjands du imma ni gaaiwiskoda.
ROM 10.1 Broþrjus, sa raihtis wilja meinis hairtins jah bida du guda bi ins du naseinai.
ROM 10.2 weitwodja auk im þatei aljan gudis haband, akei ni bi kunþja.
ROM 10.3 unkunnandans auk gudis garaihtein jah seina garaihtein sokjandans stiurjan, garaihtein gudis ni ufhausidedun.
ROM 10.4 ustauhts auk witodis Xristus du garaihtein allaim þaim galaubjandam.
ROM 10.5 Moses auk meleiþ þo garaihtein us witoda, þatei sa taujands þo manna libaiþ in izai.
ROM 10.6 iþ so us galaubeinai garaihtei swa qiþiþ:
ni qiþais in hairtin þeinamma:
ƕas ussteigiþ in himin?
þatist Xristu dalaþ attiuhan;
ROM 10.7 aiþþau:
ƕas gasteigiþ in afgrundiþa?
þatist Xristu us dauþaim iup ustiuhan.
ROM 10.8 akei ƕa qiþiþ?
neƕa þus þata waurd ist in munþa þeinamma jah in hairtin þeinamma,
þatist waurd galaubeinais þatei merjam.
ROM 10.9 þei jabai andhaitis in munþa þeinamma fraujin Iesu jah galaubeis in hairtin þeinamma þatei guþ ina urraisida us dauþaim, ganisis.
ROM 10.10 hairto auk galaubeiþ du garaihtiþai, iþ munþa andhaitada du ganistai.
ROM 10.11 qiþiþ auk þata gameliþ:
